HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: From 95,- Kč. Balíkovna na adresu: price is shown in the cart.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Aktuální ceny dopravy jsou vždy zobrazeny v košíku na našich stránkách.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Aktuální ceny dopravy jsou vždy zobrazeny v košíku na našich stránkách.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: 38 Sparkys stores across the Czech Republic

SUMMARY:
Sparkys.cz offers a wide range of delivery options in the Czech Republic. Standard home delivery is provided by Balíkovna na adresu, DPD, PPL, and GLS, with prices starting from 95 Kč and delivery times of 1-3 business days. Bulky items are handled by Geis for 149 Kč. Customers can also opt for pickup from a vast network of over 22,000 parcel shops and lockers (Balíkovna, DPD, GLS) or choose free in-store pickup at 38 Sparkys locations. The standard cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is 30 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Saturday home delivery is available via Balíkovna. In-store pickup is always free. COD payment for bulky items via Geis is cash only. Balíkovna-BOX lockers are accessible 24/7.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information page is comprehensive and clearly outlines the services offered by each courier. It provides details on delivery times, processes, and COD fees. However, specific pricing for Balíkovna services is not listed on the page and is only shown in the shopping cart. Information on free shipping thresholds for home delivery is also missing.
